items.title: Is Vanguard Dividend Appreciation ETF the Smartest Investment You Can Make Today?
items.author: The Motley Fool
items.description: The article discusses the Vanguard Dividend Appreciation ETF (VIG) as a great choice for long-term investors, despite its relatively low yield. The ETF focuses on dividend growth and has a high concentration in technology stocks, providing both income and growth potential.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article highlights the ETF's focus on dividend growth, low expense ratio, and excellent total return potential, making it a great choice for long-term investors who care more about building a future income stream than current yield.
The article mentions JPMorgan Chase as an advertising partner of Motley Fool Money, but does not provide any further analysis or commentary on the company.
